name: 王泰勛
objective:
本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包含圖面繪製、圖面匯入、刀路設定、刀路轉存 G 代碼、設備介紹及數位設備上機實作等等，落實了 CNC 從無到有的步驟。課程包含介紹兩套熱門 CAD/CAM 軟體，降低了未來接軌數位製造的門檻。
This course focuses on the concepts and implementation of computer-aided manufacturing techniques. The content includes drawing practicie, drawing import, toolpath setting, toolpath transform G-code, digital manufacture introduction and computer implementation of digital equipment, etc., implementing the steps of CNC from scratch. The course includes the introduction of two popular CAD/CAM software, which lowers the threshold for connecting with digital manufacturing in the future.
schedule:
CAD/CAM 軟體一介紹 Introduction to CAD/CAM software I
CAD/CAM 軟體一操作 CAD/CAM software operation
數位設備上機實作 Digital manufacturing machine operation
CAD/CAM 軟體二介紹 Introduction of CAD/CAM software II
CAD/CAM 軟體二操作 CAD/CAM software operations
數位設備上機實作 Digital manufacturing machine operation
